help-file.title: MINSTREL
help-file.content:
Minstrel's are the elite of the classic bards or piper, they have taken their pure bardic abilities and enhanced and expanded the power and ability of them. Their enhanced songs now touch wider ranges of scale, giving many different effects and abilities.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 36th level: Legend Lore
Songs --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 36th level: Song of Healing / Song of the Unholy (Enhanced) 36th level: Song of Harming / Song of Decay (Enhanced) 41st level: Song of Storms / Chime of the Vampire (Enhanced) 46th level: Song of Chaos / Song of the Night (Enhanced) 51st level: Song of Drifting (Drums)
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- If the Minstrel has extraordinary skill level in a particular instrument, they are able to continue to play and sing while blind.
